definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
to draw/picture/painting/CL:幅[fu2],張|张[zhang1]/classifier for paintings etc/variant of 劃|划[hua4]

sentences.english: By study Chinese Painting teaching, we know that, China has an age-old tradition for fine arts education.
sentences.chinese: 研究中国画教学，就会知道我国有着悠久的美术传统。

sentences.english: Chinese painting has an outstanding characteristic, that is to say, poetry or calligraphy is inscribed on paintings.
sentences.chinese: 中国画有一个显著的特色，就是把诗或书法题在画上。

sentences.english: Wu Tongchun's nebular art is expressed by the character of traditional Chinese painting.
sentences.chinese: 吴同椿的星云世界是用中国画的特色来表现的。

sentences.english: We go to an exhibition of chinese painting at the museum.
sentences.chinese: 我们去博物馆参观中国画展。

sentences.english: Visual attribute is the self-creation of Chinese painting with the premise of personal originality.
sentences.chinese: 直观的自我属性是中国画创作具有个人独创性的前提。

sentences.english: Ideological and practical work is the most essential unity of opposites.
sentences.chinese: 虚实关系是中国画最根本的对立统一关系。

sentences.english: The ornamental lines of the water-wave designs are taken from well-known Chinese paintings of the past.
sentences.chinese: 观赏线的水波的设计是采取由著名的中国画的过去。

sentences.english: I bought a piece of Chinese painting.
Chinese painting is known for its brush drawings in black inks and natural colours.
sentences.chinese: 中国画用毛笔蘸黑墨和天然颜料画成，并以此著称。

sentences.english: Chinese painting its brush drawings in black inks and natural colours.
sentences.chinese: 中国画用毛笔蘸黑墨和天然颜料画成，并以此而著称。

sentences.english: The time during the Ming and the Qing Dynasties had witnessed the origination and early development of Chinese painting studies.
sentences.chinese: 明清之际是中国画学研究的酝酿期，学科特征初显。

sentences.english: Ping, are there any good places to buy Chinese paintings?
sentences.chinese: 平，有买中国画的好地方吗？

sentences.english: Lines in Chinese painting is a kind of artistic expression with eastern artistic characters.
sentences.chinese: 中国画的线是一种富于东方艺术特质的艺术表现形式。

sentences.english: The Moon Night is kept by the Chinese Painting Academy and included into the album published by the Academy.
sentences.chinese: 《月夜》由中国画研究院收藏，并入选该院画集。

sentences.english: Every foreign visitor takes a great fancy to this traditional Chinese painting.
sentences.chinese: 每一个外宾都十分喜欢这张中国画。

sentences.english: Up till now much passiveness has still existed in the teaching of Chinese painting in the universities.
sentences.chinese: 目前高校中国画传统教学存在着很大的被动性。

definition: freehand drawing or painting in traditional Chinese style
gongbi, traditional Chinese painting method characterized by meticulous brush technique and detailed description
blue-and-green landscape (genre of landscape painting originating in the Tang dynasty, in which blues and greens predominate)
Huang Binhong (1865-1955), art historian and literati painter
